column4: Hello man. That was a no go. I think. I pressed ESC when grub started the countown, came in to this little box. Entered the top choice, made a new line with vga=ask. And then I pressed the letter that was for boot.
You were in the right place, You don't make a new line, you add to the end of you 'kernel .... ' line
Yeah, that didnt turn out as I hoped...
But thanks anyway! Kudos for helping people out.
